name: Fear and Smol Things in Guildfegas
name_original: Fear and Smol Things in Guildfegas
description:
Deep in the abandoned streets of a once thriving town lay a small corner plot on the top of a high building that overlooked the street. Giants used to meetup here, every day when the sun went down. They never used to bother us, it was like we was invisible to them.

Credits:

Narrator - Dave Jones

Plants - Victor Rasuly

2D Art - Amy B

Concept Art - Badger

3D Art - Shrex

3D Art - Kaz

3D Art - Artendy Malik (TBA)

Animation - Pixuele

Music - Chris Thomson-Drew

Sound Design/Narrative - Kevin Davey

Unity Wrangler - Alyx Jones
